## Application interface

Overall application level config, e.g., 'chrome'.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Application 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [accent](./core.application.accent.md) |  | () =&gt; Color | Base accent color that drives theme |
|  [background](./core.application.background.md) |  | () =&gt; Color | Color used for all main UI backgrounds in an app |
|  [border](./core.application.border.md) |  | () =&gt; Color | Use for general dividers and borders throughout the application. |
|  [error](./core.application.error.md) |  | () =&gt; Color | Color to use for error signals |
|  [faint](./core.application.faint.md) |  | () =&gt; Color | Very faint color for subtle backgrounds and borders. |
|  [foreground](./core.application.foreground.md) |  | () =&gt; Color | Default text color throughout the app |
|  [highContrast](./core.application.highcontrast.md) |  | () =&gt; Color | Provides a color that is high contrast against the background for bright annotations. |
|  [lowContrast](./core.application.lowcontrast.md) |  | () =&gt; Color | Provides a color that is low contrast against the background for subtle annotations. |
|  [lowMidContrast](./core.application.lowmidcontrast.md) |  | () =&gt; Color | Provides a color that is low/mid contrast against the background for subtle annotations. |
|  [midContrast](./core.application.midcontrast.md) |  | () =&gt; Color | Provides a color that is medium contrast against the background for moderate annotations. |
|  [midHighContrast](./core.application.midhighcontrast.md) |  | () =&gt; Color | Provides a color that is mid/high contrast against the background for brighter annotations. |
|  [success](./core.application.success.md) |  | () =&gt; Color | Color for success signals |
|  [warning](./core.application.warning.md) |  | () =&gt; Color | Color to use for warning signals |
